extendedInfo.description: Application that allows you to enter and see a map the location of their land.With the help of GPS data or giving the corners of their land manually, you can enter the land you want and when you want to consult a map with satellite view.In this way, you can geotag and to always have the location of their land and their limits.You can use Google Navigation to know how to get to your land (in land satellite view, press menu key and select "how to get" option)Now, information dialog has perimeter and area values of land

reviews.title: GPS Land - Loser
reviews.comment: This app sucks !  It is a big land loser.  I activated my best GPS app before this survey app would even work. After allowing my phone to get accurate readings, I walked off my property, stopped and allowed the app to get accurate readings at every corner of my property. When finished, I asked the program to show my surveyed land.  None of the information was correct. It showed my property as being almost 2000 yards west of my real property.  I\'ve removed this loser.
reviews.author: Bob Rogers
